mapper.select:
select TOP 1 FIRST 1
from ujcms_channel t where t.parent_id_ = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ROWNUM <= 1 order by t.order_, t.id_ FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
LIMIT 1

select t.id_ from ujcms_channel t
t.id_ in (select roleChannel.channel_id_ from ujcms_role_channel roleChannel where roleChannel.role_id_ in #{id} and t.site_id_ = #{siteId})
or t.id_ in (select orgChannel.channel_id_ from ujcms_org_channel orgChannel where orgChannel.org_id_ in #{id} and t.site_id_ = #{siteId})

select
from ujcms_channel t where t.parent_id_ = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by t.order_, t.id_

select
from ujcms_channel t where t.parent_id_ = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by t.order_, t.id_
select t.id_, t.alias_, t.type_ from ujcms_channel t where t.site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by t.order_, t.id_
mapper.update: update ujcms_channel set order_ = order_ + #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id_ in (select t.descendant_id_ from ujcms_channel_tree t where t.ancestor_id_ = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

sql.if: , CASE WHEN exists(select * from ujcms_channel childChannel where childChannel.parent_id_ = t.id_) THEN '1' ELSE '0' END as has_children_

trim.if: t.id_ in (select roleArticle.channel_id_ from ujcms_role_article roleArticle where roleArticle.role_id_ in #{id})
or t.id_ in (select orgArticle.channel_id_ from ujcms_org_article orgArticle where orgArticle.org_id_ in #{id})

mapper.update: update ujcms_channel set site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, channel_model_id_ = #{channelModelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, article_model_id_ = #{articleModelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, performance_type_id_ = #{performanceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alias_ = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_ = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, article_template_ = #{articleTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_template_ = #{channelTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_ = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link_url_ = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_key_ = #{processKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_blank_ = #{targetBlank,jdbcType=CHAR}, real_ = #{real,jdbcType=CHAR}, nav_ = #{nav,jdbcType=CHAR}, page_size_ = #{pageSize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, order_desc_ = #{orderDesc,jdbcType=CHAR}, allow_comment_ = #{allowComment,jdbcType=CHAR}, allow_contribute_ = #{allowContribute,jdbcType=CHAR}, allow_search_ = #{allowSearch,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_ = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_ = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, book_ = #{book,jdbcType=CHAR}, channel_static_path_ = #{channelStaticPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mains_json_ = #{mainsJson,jdbcType=OTHER}, clobs_json_ = #{clobsJson,jdbcType=OTHER} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_channel (id_, site_id_, parent_id_, channel_model_id_, article_model_id_, performance_type_id_, name_, alias_, type_, article_template_, channel_template_, image_, link_url_, process_key_, target_blank_, real_, nav_, page_size_, order_desc_, allow_comment_, allow_contribute_, allow_search_, created_, modified_, depth_, order_, views_, self_views_, book_, channel_static_path_, mains_json_, clobs_json_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelModelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{articleModelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{performanceTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{articleTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelTemplate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetBlank,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{real,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{nav,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{orderDesc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{allowComment,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{allowContribute,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{allowSearch,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{depth,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{views,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{selfViews,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{book,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{channelStaticPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainsJson,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{clobsJson,jdbcType=OTHER})
mapper.sql: t.id_, t.site_id_, t.parent_id_, t.channel_model_id_, t.article_model_id_, t.performance_type_id_, t.name_, t.alias_, t.type_, t.article_template_, t.channel_template_, t.image_, t.link_url_, t.process_key_, t.target_blank_, t.real_, t.nav_, t.page_size_, t.order_desc_, t.allow_comment_, t.allow_contribute_, t.allow_search_, t.created_, t.modified_, t.depth_, t.order_, t.views_, t.self_views_, t.book_, t.channel_static_path_, t.mains_json_, t.clobs_json_
